reqTipNumTokens.Title: Tip Tokens for Song Request
reqTipNumTokens.Description: Set to 0 to disable tipping requirement to add to queue

reqCreditsGivenPerTip.Title: Song Requests per Tip
reqCreditsGivenPerTip.Description: Number of song requests credits a user is given per song req tip

showReqAddedBy.Title: Display Usernames
showReqAddedBy.Description: Show the song requester's username (except for anon tips)

reqEditable.Title: Allow Edits
reqEditable.Description: Users can edit their song requests

modsHaveQueuePriv.Title: Mods Can Edit the Queue
modsHaveQueuePriv.Description: Moderators are allowed to modify the queue

modsHaveCreditPriv.Title: Mods Can Edit Request Credits
modsHaveCreditPriv.Description: Moderators can give/remove users' song request credits

addRequestViaTipMsgEnabled.Title: Add Song from Tip Message Enabled
addRequestViaTipMsgEnabled.Description: Allow users to add their request by tip message

addRequestViaChatMsgEnabled.Title: Add Song from Chat Message Enabled
addRequestViaChatMsgEnabled.Description: Next message the user sends after tipping will be their request

addRequestViaCmdEnabled.Title: Add Song from `/queue add` Command Enabled
addRequestViaCmdEnabled.Description: Users may use the `/queue add` command (if they have tipped)
